abstract: Tyler Kepner Extra Bases column celebrates Toledo Mud Hens infielder and designated hitter Mike Hessman, who reached a professional goal he set out for himself in 1996 as a 15th-round draft choice; Hessman now sits alone at top of list of career home runs for any player in affiliated minor leagues with 433.
lead_paragraph: Mike Hessman, 37, who now sits alone atop the career home run list for the affiliated minor leagues, is thankful to have had brief chances in the major leagues.

headline.main: A Minor League Home Run King Without Major Fanfare
headline.print_headline: A Home Run King Without Major Fanfare

snippet: Mike Hessman, 37, who now sits alone atop the career home run list for the affiliated minor leagues, is thankful to have had brief chances in the major leagues.
